stage1.title: Woodland Guide
stage1.description: Follow a total of 10 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

stage2.title: Woodland Guide
stage2.description: Follow a total of 20 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.

stage3.title: Woodland Guide
stage3.description: Follow a total of 40 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, and Vanarana.
